verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>. As whirlwinds <S%H5492><s%> in the South <S%H5045><s%> sweep <S%H2498><s%> through <S%H935><s%>, it cometh from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, from a terrible <S%H3372><s%> land <S%H776><s%>.

A grievous <S%H7186><s%> vision <S%H2380><s%> is declared <S%H5046><s%> unto me <S%H898><s%>; the treacherous man dealeth treacherously <S%H898><s%>, and the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> destroyeth <S%H7703><s%>. Go up <S%H5927><s%>, O Elam <S%H5867><s%>; besiege <S%H6696><s%>, O Media <S%H4074><s%>; all the sighing <S%H585><s%> thereof have I made to cease <S%H7673><s%>.

Therefore are my loins <S%H4975><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with anguish <S%H2479><s%>; pangs <S%H6735><s%> have taken hold <S%H270><s%> upon me <S%H6735><s%>, as the pangs of a woman in travail <S%H3205><s%>: I am pained <S%H5753><s%> so that I cannot hear <S%H8085><s%>; I am dismayed <S%H926><s%> so that I cannot see <S%H7200><s%>.

My heart <S%H3824><s%> fluttereth <S%H8582><s%>, horror <S%H6427><s%> hath affrighted <S%H1204><s%> me <S%H5399><s%>; the twilight that I desired <S%H2837><s%> hath been turned <S%H7760><s%> into trembling unto me <S%H2731><s%>.

They prepare <S%H6186><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>, they set <S%H6186><s%> the watch <S%H6822><s%>, they eat <S%H398><s%>, they drink <S%H8354><s%>: rise <S%H6965><s%> up <S%H8269><s%>, ye princes, anoint <S%H4886><s%> the shield <S%H4043><s%>.
For thus hath the Lord <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3212><s%>, Go, set <S%H5975><s%> a watchman <S%H6822><s%>: let him declare <S%H5046><s%> what he seeth <S%H7200><s%>:

and when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> a troop <S%H7393><s%>, horsemen <S%H6571><s%> in pairs <S%H6776><s%>, a troop <S%H7393><s%> of asses <S%H2543><s%>, a troop <S%H7393><s%> of camels <S%H1581><s%>, he shall hearken <S%H7181><s%> diligently <S%H7182><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> heed <S%H7182><s%>.

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%>: O Lord <S%H136><s%>, I stand <S%H5975><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> upon the watch-tower <S%H4707><s%> in the day-time <S%H3119><s%>, and am set <S%H5324><s%> in my ward <S%H4931><s%> whole nights <S%H3915><s%>;

and <S%H935><s%>, behold, here cometh a troop <S%H7393><s%> of men <S%H376><s%>, horsemen <S%H6571><s%> in pairs <S%H6776><s%>. And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Fallen <S%H5307><s%>, fallen <S%H5307><s%> is Babylon <S%H894><s%>; and all the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of her gods <S%H430><s%> are broken <S%H7665><s%> unto the ground <S%H776><s%>.

O thou my threshing <S%H4098><s%>, and the grain <S%H1121><s%> of my floor <S%H1637><s%>! that which I have heard <S%H8085><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, have I declared unto you <S%H5046><s%>.

The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Dumah <S%H1746><s%>. One calleth <S%H7121><s%> unto me out of Seir <S%H8165><s%>, Watchman <S%H8104><s%>, what of the night <S%H3915><s%>? Watchman <S%H8104><s%>, what of the night <S%H3915><s%>?

The watchman <S%H8104><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, The morning <S%H1242><s%> cometh <S%H857><s%>, and also the night <S%H3915><s%>: if ye will inquire <S%H1158><s%>, inquire <S%H1158><s%> ye <S%H7725><s%>: turn ye <S%H857><s%>, come.
The burden <S%H4853><s%> upon Arabia <S%H6152><s%>. In the forest <S%H3293><s%> in Arabia <S%H6152><s%> shall ye lodge <S%H3885><s%>, O ye caravans <S%H736><s%> of Dedanites <S%H1720><s%>.

Unto him <S%H7125><s%> that was thirsty <S%H6771><s%> they brought <S%H857><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>; the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Tema <S%H8485><s%> did meet <S%H6923><s%> the fugitives <S%H5074><s%> with their bread <S%H3899><s%>.

For they fled <S%H5074><s%> away from <S%H6440><s%> the swords <S%H2719><s%>, from <S%H6440><s%> the drawn <S%H5203><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>, and from <S%H6440><s%> the bent <S%H1869><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%>, and from <S%H6440><s%> the grievousness <S%H3514><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>.

For thus hath the Lord <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H8141><s%>, Within a year, according to the years <S%H8141><s%> of a hireling <S%H7916><s%>, all the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%>;

and the residue <S%H7605><s%> of the number <S%H4557><s%> of the archers <S%H7198><s%>, the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, shall be few <S%H4591><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hath spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.
